definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Roxarsone is excreted mostly as its parent drug in animal manure.
sentences.chinese: 洛克沙胂進入動物體後，大部分以原形隨糞便排出。

sentences.english: The same is true of seeds that pass through farm animals that graze on weeds.
sentences.chinese: 這對從耕畜糞便中排出的雜草種子也同樣有效。

sentences.english: Some were covered in excrement, and many were suffering from malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 一些人被糞便覆蓋，許多人營養不良。

sentences.english: So that the ordinary point I was sleeping in the bacterial manure.
sentences.chinese: 以是說的普通一點我根本是睡在細菌的糞便上。

sentences.english: We isolated 101 strains of Clostridium difficile from feces of patients and hamsters.
sentences.chinese: 我們從病人糞便和地鼠糞中分離出難辨梭菌101株。

sentences.english: Guano means droppings from seabirds used as a sort of fertilizer .
sentences.chinese: 鳥糞層就是海鳥的糞便，可以用作肥料。

sentences.english: Poultrymanure is different from many sources of industry pollution with its fertility.
sentences.chinese: 禽糞便同許多工業污染源不同，其中含有豐富的肥源。

sentences.english: This produces the bleeding that allows detection through a stool guaiac test.
sentences.chinese: 會引起出血，可以通過糞便檢查出來。

sentences.english: Although the sea breaks up the waste, beaches may become polluted.
sentences.chinese: 雖然大海可以把糞便衝散，但海濱可能受到污染。

sentences.english: Another belief is that they are the precious dung of the Garuda or Khyung bird.
sentences.chinese: 另一種認爲是他們的寶貴糞便的嘉魯達或穹鳥。

sentences.english: Andfarmers can use camel west waste to fertilize their crops.
sentences.chinese: 農民能用駱駝的糞便來給農作物施肥。

sentences.english: The valve trap effectively prevents sewage and fecal backflow into the house, ensuring the smooth flow of the drainage system.
sentences.chinese: 有效防止污水及糞便倒流入室內，而可保持排水暢順。

sentences.english: Scientists must analyze which diets cause the least fecal effluvia.
sentences.chinese: 科學家必須分析哪些飲食造成至少糞便臭氣。

sentences.english: Every stool was looser than the one before, and smelled fouler.
sentences.chinese: 每一條糞便都比前面的更鬆軟，更難聞。

sentences.english: In some cases, the rectum is damaged and stool leaks out.
sentences.chinese: 有些病例直腸受損，糞便會持續泄漏出來。

sentences.english: Animal faeces also contain microorganisms that can cause diarrhoea.
sentences.chinese: 動物糞便也含有可引起腹瀉的微生物。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
to feed (a child, domestic animal etc)/to keep/to raise (an animal)
